title: Student Health Services and COVID-19 - Student Health Services
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Testing Access details about diagnostic testing. Student Health Services plays a pivotal role in the university's response to COVID-19. From planning risk mitigation and treatment efforts to the creation of flexible staffing solutions to effectively optimize medical and mental health response during the pandemic, we are prepared to meet the needs of our campus community. Students can be seen either in-person at our facilities or via tele-appointments, depending on the preference of the individual patient or to minimize unnecessary risk of infectious disease exposure to patients and staff. Student Health Services offers the Novavax COVID-19 vaccine at the Center for Health and Well-Being. Monday - Friday: 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., First Floor 101B Access details about diagnostic testing. Learn what to do if you test positive or are exposed to COVID-19.
